courseUnitContentId.description: The unit to associate this topic with

curriculumTopicContentId.description: The curriculum version of a topic to assicate this topic with

topicTypeId.description: Whether the topic is a homework or any exam

startDate.description: The date in which the topic is available to student's

endDate.description: The date in which the topic is available to student's

deadDate.description: The date in which the topic is available to student's

partialExtend.description: Whether or not there can be a partial extension on the topic (dead date that is different than the end date

contentOrder.description: A number to sort on when fetching topics for a unit
